name: ynab-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for YNAB (You Need A Budget) integration
long_description: This extension provides AI assistants with secure access to You Need A Budget (YNAB) data and functionality. The server acts as a bridge between AI applications and the YNAB API, exposing budget management capabilities through standardized MCP tools including budget management, account operations, transaction handling, category management, payee operations, and utility functions.

tools.name: ynab:list_budgets
tools.description: List all budgets associated with the user's account

tools.name: ynab:get_budget
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific budget

tools.name: ynab:list_accounts
tools.description: List all accounts for a specific budget

tools.name: ynab:get_account
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific account

tools.name: ynab:create_account
tools.description: Create a new account in the specified budget

tools.name: ynab:list_transactions
tools.description: List transactions for a budget with optional filtering

tools.name: ynab:get_transaction
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific transaction

tools.name: ynab:create_transaction
tools.description: Create a new transaction in the specified budget and account

tools.name: ynab:delete_transaction
tools.description: Delete a transaction from the specified budget

tools.name: ynab:list_categories
tools.description: List all categories for a specific budget

tools.name: ynab:get_category
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific category

tools.name: ynab:update_category
tools.description: Update the budgeted amount for a category in the current month

tools.name: ynab:list_payees
tools.description: List all payees for a specific budget

tools.name: ynab:get_payee
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific payee

tools.name: ynab:get_month
tools.description: Get budget data for a specific month

tools.name: ynab:list_months
tools.description: List all months summary data for a budget

tools.name: ynab:get_user
tools.description: Get information about the authenticated user

tools.name: ynab:convert_amount
tools.description: Convert between dollars and milliunits with integer arithmetic for precision
